Detailed Description

Defines and Macros for accessing the SGDMA IP module. The registers are defined and the various bits within each register. This file mimics the SGDMA class found in the PCIeAPI_Lib DLL, but is used in kernel driver land, not user land.

The SGDMA contains the following registers:

  • Global configuration and control registers
  • Channel setup registers
  • Buffer Descriptor registers

Macros are provided to access each of these categories and make configuring channels and buffer descriptors easier.

Definition in file SGDMA.h.
